info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 10:41AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Lake Effect Snow for Southeastern Kane County... Through 1230 PM, a lake effect snow band will affect southeastern Lake County, including Aurora and Montgomery. The snow may fall at a heavier clip at times, reducing visibility to under one mile and accumulating on untreated surfaces. Little to no snow is expected across the remainder of the county. Expect to encounter snow covered roads across portions of southern Kane County. If you will be driving, leave extra time to reach your destination. When driving on snow covered roads, slow down and increase following distance between your vehicle and other vehicles.
